name: LoveBox
description:
Synopsis

Harassed from an early age for being different, you finally find happiness when you meet Emma. Your tormentors, who see you swimming in happiness, decide to kidnap your girlfriend. 

You then decide to cross dangers and unknowns to free her from evil.

Controls
  • Left and Right arrows : Move
  • Up arrow : Interract
  • Down arrow : invicible
  • Space + Down arrow : Dive attack
  • Space : Jump

It's  a demo.

Thanks to koralysart (IG) for the main menu.
